name: Orlando
title: Frontend Developer
about: Experience working with teams to produce impactful, cutting-edge websites that engage customers and deliver business results. Good understanding of design standards and user preferences.

descriptions: Collaboration with SCRUM team during development processes to confirm creative proposals and design best practices.
Designing and updating designs to meet usability and performance requirements.
Performing user experience quality assurance testing to identify and address deficiencies.
Coordination with the digital content manager to obtain content for updates and enhancements.
Monitored operations and provided corrective feedback to achieve daily and long-term goals.
Managed daily operations while overseeing multiple locations to foster increased productivity.
Collaborated closely with organizational leadership and board of directors to guide operational strategy.
Oversaw office workflow and administrative processes to maintain smooth operations.
Evaluated company documentation for compliance with regulatory requirements.
Supervision and coordination of workflows to optimize resources.

education.name: Public University of El Alto
descriptions: He has completed professional development in Reliability Measurement based on cyclomatic complexity of procedural stream in node.js and black box testing.
Elected as Executive Secretary of the Student Center (a.i.) for the Systems Engineering course in 2013.
Elected as President of the electoral committee for the election of the student center for the Systems Engineering career in 2013.
